channel.title: <508>Nobiwa scape<508>
channel.description:
first of welcome all to my topic off my server.
i will try to get this topic updated every day.
i started with the source scaperune 513. the 513 i just a name becuase the source is 508 espeon based i editted and coded alot since the beginning.
first i introduce myself. my name is melvin and i am 16 years things i have done before this post: -cleaned the commands.java -editted some commands -changed the home sector -inserted the new shops -make npc's work -magin on npc -magic on npc and player autocast -removed all thet bending ability's -made a new working entrance for godwars -made a new working entrance for the kq -handled some more packets -offerx in trade working -offerx in shops working with commands -the chat color for me is editted -u can range/mage some npc's without a crash -placed more npc's in the city to get it more interactive -dfs operate working -did by weapons correct interfaces
things done after i posted this - added dialogue file - added a agility course - added woodcutting (uploading pictures later) - base set for hunting implings. - bussy with adding all correct interfaces. - base set for quest all fariables set. - npc help in combat almost done. need to find the correct attacking methods. its only with helping killing players - maked a working npcoption3 file. - - - -
pictures: [IMG]http://img329.imageshack.us/img329/8003/serverimage1.png[/img] home starting area. [URL=http://img299.imageshack.us/i/serverimage2.png/][IMG]http://img299.imageshack.us/img299/1117/serverimage2.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img512.imageshack.us/i/serverimage3.png/][IMG]http://img512.imageshack.us/img512/1313/serverimage3.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img32.imageshack.us/i/serverimage4.png/][IMG]http://img32.imageshack.us/img32/8364/serverimage4.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img23.imageshack.us/i/serverimage5.png/][IMG]http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/9121/serverimage5.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img329.imageshack.us/i/serverimage6.png/][IMG]http://img329.imageshack.us/img329/9875/serverimage6.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img17.imageshack.us/i/serverimage7.png/][IMG]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/719/serverimage7.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img406.imageshack.us/i/serverimage8.png/][IMG]http://img406.imageshack.us/img406/8608/serverimage8.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img132.imageshack.us/i/serverimage9.png/][IMG]http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/5163/serverimage9.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img32.imageshack.us/i/serverimage10.png/][IMG]http://img32.imageshack.us/img32/1084/serverimage10.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img17.imageshack.us/i/serverimage11.png/][IMG]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/6728/serverimage11.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img17.imageshack.us/i/serverimage12.png/][IMG]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/8449/serverimage12.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img23.imageshack.us/i/serverimage13.png/][IMG]http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/8638/serverimage13.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img263.imageshack.us/i/serverimage14.png/][IMG]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/7130/serverimage14.png[/img][/URL]
video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pRsJnqp-hds
information: some information about the server the dragons will folow you and will say rawr. how higher you level in summoning the stronger you dragon's level. you can choose in 4 colors

item.title: <508>Nobiwa scape<508>
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

Nice man but remove customs you will get flamed there ugly, sorry. People like 525 real customs so add d claws statius, vesta, morigans and so on.

Read full topic

item.title: <508>Nobiwa scape<508>
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

hm… nice, the owners of scaperune would never have done what you have:

things i have done before this post:
-cleaned the commands.java
-editted some commands
-changed the home sector
-inserted the new shops
-make npc’s work
-magin on npc
-magic on npc and player autocast
-removed all thet bending ability’s
-made a new working entrance for godwars
-made a new working entrance for the kq
-handled some more packets
-offerx in trade working
-offerx in shops working with commands
-the chat color for me is editted
-u can range/mage some npc’s without a crash
-placed more npc’s in the city to get it more interactive
-dfs operate working
-did by weapons correct interfaces

things done after i posted this
- added dialogue file
- added a agility course
- added woodcutting (uploading pictures later)
- base set for hunting implings.
- bussy with adding all correct interfaces.
- base set for quest all fariables set.
- npc help in combat almost done. need to find the correct attacking methods. its only with helping killing players
- maked a working npcoption3 file.
-
-
-
-

(How do i know? I’ve been a mod on their server for quite some time now…)

Read full topic
